price: A kò kọ́ Ànábì - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - ní ewì. Kò yẹ ẹ́ (kò sì rọ̀ ọ́ lọ́rùn láti kéwì). Kí ni ohun (tí A fi ránṣẹ́ sí i) bí kò ṣe ìrántí àti al-Ƙur’ān pọ́nńbélé
arabic: وَمَا عَلَّمۡنَٰهُ ٱلشِّعۡرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لَهُۥٓۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ وَقُرۡءَانٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā ʿallamnāhu al-shiʿ'ra wamā yanbaghī lahu in huwa illā dhik'run waqur'ānun mubīnun
